ending.2: Seriously, you like xoxoxo heart heart heart this.
ending.3: In response to your devotion, I'd like to offer you the ability to play longer.
ending.4: Just drink one of these magic potions and your life will be extended. Or shortened. This is all about your needs, after all. 100 rolls, 240 rolls, 1000 rolls, 2000 rolls, 5000 rolls.
ending.5: Just drink one of these magic potions and your life will be extended. Or shortened. This is all about your needs, after all. 100 rolls, 240 rolls, 1000 rolls, 2000 rolls, 5000 rolls.
ending.10: This is like that secret in Super Mario Bros where you could jump over the flagpole. There's nothing here, but you should feel very special for finding it anyway.
